title: You vs. Chris & Kem
overview: Chris and Kem reunite to go head to head with the viewing public in You vs. Chris & Kem. The series sees the loveable duo embrace their competitive spirits as they team up to take on the viewers in a series of outlandish, impulsive and no holds barred challenges that put their teamwork to the test.Travelling up and down the country in their specially designed â€˜Bro Mobile', the Love Island double act will be assigned each challenge via their social media channels, in real time.With only clues to guide them, Chris and Kem must decide whether to take on the challenge, knowing little about what exactly it will entail and who they will be competing against.
